main_definition: To mention or quote something as a source of information, often in written work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Mentioning or citing a source to support an argument or statement.
meanings_and_examples.example: The researcher referenced several studies to back up his hypothesis.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Identifying and listing the sources of information used in a document, such as academic papers or articles.
meanings_and_examples.example: When writing her thesis, she made sure to reference all the books and articles she had consulted.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To use data from a specific source within one's own work.
meanings_and_examples.example: In his report, he referenced statistics from the latest census findings.
